post.body: u may be leaving the echo chamber, my friend, but you'll still be in the company of a few parrots this wk. :-) Have a good trip
stay strong! Just say no to the dark side. :-)
you know, there is always @vmware to help wean you off your addiction. :-)
superamit Yeah, Thunderbird's UI is def. clunky. Yay for the Gpod demo! If you need anything, let me know. Where/when do you speak?
dude, I hear you. That should be a standard feature on mail apps these days. Ever tried Thunderbird? Not perfect, but closer.
thanks! You're a sweetheart. :-)
hope your setup goes well. We just finished. We're in south hall, on the far left. Come visit! I'll try to stop by your booth, too.
Exhausted from a full day at #Macworld on just 3 hours sleep. No time to rest yet, though. First, more work.
I got a happy new year card from Hotel Clement in Paris. I love boutique hotels... and Paris.
Just video ambushed @ijustine in a telephone booth at the Google stand. #macworld
I'm at Moscone Center - http://bkite.com/03whu
Getting mobbed by @jobyinc Gorillapod fans at #Macworld - Stop by Booth #214 in the South Hall to say hi.
It's been a 23 hour day, and I'm finally calling it a night. Have to be up again in 3 hours. I hope I survive the first day of Macworld.
Sigh... 20 hours later and still working. Why won't this day end already?
Why is it impossible to find Newburg sauce in SF? Also, there appears to have been a run on the pasta aisle here. It is empty.
Setting up the @jobyinc booth for Macworld.
I'm at Moscone Center (San Francisco, CA, United States) - http://bkite.com/03uLi
Dear Smart car driver: why must you park in a scarce full size space when there are dozens of free compact spaces? Not so smart, imho.
Been working like mad since 6am, and there is no sign this day will let up. Haven't even had time for coffee! Gah!
Steve Jobs addresses rumors about his health in an open letter to the Apple community: http://bit.ly/LSHX
